item.description:
Belief Centered Healing

This topic is one that I presented at the NGH conference.  originally intended for anyone working with clients for any type of holistic and.or even alopathic type of healing, this can be attended by anyone.

Find out just how strong belief can be in the healing process.  Find out how devastating belief can be also.

This will be a multi-media presentation with demonstrations and exercises for all attendees. 

This is a chance to bring your friends along to s how them just how powerful belief can be.  If you presently have a practice, the information presented here may help you enhance the results you get in your practice.

Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be. 

Kevin Martin 978-273-5905 kenda_assoc@msn.com www.poseffects.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston NLP Meetup - Methuen - Belief Centered Healing
